column4: so. I'm running ubuntu 10.10 netbook edition off a usb stick, and I went to "try ubuntu" to which it said I didn't have a driver necessary to run unity
(running an nvidia 310-m) -- if I install it to disk is there a way to find a possible driver?
I'd much rather run unity over the standard gnome
I think it's required to set up certs or it won't work
